description:
Ever wanted to understand how blockchain will change the world? And how to make your own? No programming or technical knowledge needed, just bring your thinking caps.

Don’t forget: security deposit of 0.025 ETH needed! We will return it when you arrive at the event!

More info at:
https://www.eventbrite.com/e/designing-blockchain-incentive-systems-tickets-45207293231
name: BUILD YOUR OWN ECONOMY – Designing Blockchain Incentive Systems Workshop
